Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'Babylonia Gray Raven Lounge'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Commandant—Ah, Liv and Lee, you're here too. Great! Let's all play a game together!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As usual, Kamui strolls cheerily and breezily into the Gray Raven Lounge, greeting the preoccupants.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Yep! I got my hands on this thing over here!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui waves the thing in his hand. It looks like a faded box, with the picture of a vacation beach on the cover and a title that reads "Memories O\'n～Venus Beach".'}
{2: 'Could this be...', 3: '13', 4: 'This looks a little like those types of...', 5: '13'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "That's right! It's what they call a game cartridge in the Golden Age! You don't really see 'em anymore!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Looks fun, yeah?', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Not at all. I don't really care if you play games in your leisure, but don't drag us into it. Would be one hell of a joke if my first disciplinary action since joining Babylonia came from playing games with you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'You know that to us Constructs, we have no need for entertainment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "But Commandant said you, Karen, and the others played card games before! Isn't that entertainment?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Those were pure mechanical and probabilistic calculations. There's nothing wrong with that.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Oh yeah? Games CAN also just be interactive virtual spaces. AND, game design involves a lot of pure mechanical and probabilistic calculations that's all the heat in the Golden Age. Shouldn't that be right up your alley?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'And, and, this game is super fun! Even Lucia said so!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia plays games?', 3: '25'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I saw her by herself so I asked, and she said yes super quick! That threw me for a loop, Lucia is just so affable now!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'But halfway through the game, she said she had to do personal training and scooted off.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'So I came over to play with you guys! This game is more fun with more people!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Don't you have anything else to do? Say... combat training? Liv and I are busy.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Kamui', 3: "But you've already reassembled your gun eight times while I'm talking, and Liv is just staring at the lounge walls. And, Commandant, you're just back from the last mission, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Humans! Especially humans after a long day of work! Need some proper entertainment to relax!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Constructs don't get tired like humans, but prolonged and intense battles can cause bad data to clump up in our M.I.N.D.s! At times like these, it's good to wind down!", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: "What you say should make a lot of sense, but suddenly, not so much when it's coming out of your mouth. Sorry, but playing games just sounds like stuffing junk files into my M.I.N.D.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Commandant! Help me convince the guy!', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll deal with the disciplinary actions, if there are any.", 3: '37', 4: "Let's all play some games and chill!", 5: '37'}
{3: "Lee sighs. He gives off an I-knew-you'd-say-this face."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I knew you'd say that, but Kamui is a member of Strike Hawk. It's not good to spoil him too much.", 4: '2'}
{2: "So it's okay to spoil my own members?", 3: '40', 4: 'Yeah! Got it!', 5: '42'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's not what I meant... Never mind.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I don't think you got even a fraction of it.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Despite Lee's dismissive words, he seems to have acquiesced."}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Wa-wa-weewa! Lee is actually so nice today!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Looks like you're dying to part with your vocal module.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv, join us too!', 3: '50'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Well... If you say so, Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui gives a cheer and quickly powers up a game console he brought in from who knows where. He then shoves the game controllers into the hands of the trio.'}
{3: 'After setting up the device, Kamui stares at the screen and begins to skillfully navigate through the menus.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "You can scan and upload your appearance in this game! I'll help you guys import your data. Lee, don't forget to use a cooler-looking one! Oh, Liv, which frame's appearance do you want to use?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Let me think... I'll use my Luminance frame.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oh, right, right, Commandant, you gotta put this on.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Kamui comes close and hands over a device.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I borrowed this deep-dive VR headset from the Virtual Center. Commandant, you can't image virtual avatars like us Construct, so it's easier for you to use this instead.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'If I recall, Constructs have to fill out an application form and go through a lot of trouble to borrow from Babylonia. You sure went out of your way, huh.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Because I want to play games with Commandant! Are you ready, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{3: "And so, you put on the VR device according to Kamui's instructions..."}
